meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. It's related to the meaning of the kanji 見 "see," but this one is about having someone else see something. In other words, it means <vocabulary>to show</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is the same as the one that you learned with the kanji, so you should be able to read it.
